description: This file defines the routing logic for a Flutter mobile application. It includes route constants, route generation function with support for static and dynamic routes (e.g., book details with an ID parameter), and fallback handling for undefined routes.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: A class that encapsulates route names and provides a static method for route generation in the app.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: A static method that generates routes based on the route settings, supporting static routes and dynamic book detail routes with IDs.
